00023 #ifndef __NITF_HANDLE_HPP__
00024 #define __NITF_HANDLE_HPP__
00025 
00031 #include <import/sys.h>
00032 #include "nitf/System.hpp"
00033 #include <iostream>
00034 
00035 namespace nitf
00036 {
00037 
00042 class Handle
00043 {
00044 public:
00045     Handle() : refCount(0) {}
00046     virtual ~Handle() {}
00047 
00049     int getRef() { return refCount; }
00050 
00052     int incRef()
00053     {
00054         mutex.lock();
00055         refCount++;
00056         mutex.unlock();
00057         return refCount;
00058     }
00059 
00061     int decRef()
00062     {
00063         mutex.lock();
00064         if (refCount > 0)
00065             refCount--;
00066         mutex.unlock();
00067         return refCount;
00068     }
00069 
00070 protected:
00071     static sys::Mutex mutex;
00072     int refCount;
00073 };
00074 
00075 
00081 template <typename T>
00082 struct MemoryDestructor
00083 {
00084     virtual void operator()(T* nativeObject) {}
00085     virtual ~MemoryDestructor() {}
00086 };
00087 
00088 
00095 template <typename Class_T, typename DestructFunctor_T = MemoryDestructor<Class_T> >
00096 class BoundHandle : public Handle
00097 {
00098 private:
00099     Class_T* handle;
00100     bool managed;
00101 
00102 public:
00104     BoundHandle() : handle(NULL), managed(true) {}
00105 
00107     BoundHandle(Class_T* h) : handle(h), managed(true) {}
00108 
00110     virtual ~BoundHandle()
00111     {
00112         //call the destructor, to destroy the object
00113         if(handle && !managed)
00114         {
00115             DestructFunctor_T functor;
00116             functor(handle);
00117         }
00118     }
00119 
00121     Handle& operator=(Class_T* h)
00122     {
00123         if (h != handle)
00124             handle = h;
00125         return *this;
00126     }
00127 
00129     Class_T* get() { return handle; }
00130 
00132     Class_T** getAddress() { return &handle; }
00133 
00141     void setManaged(bool flag) { managed = flag; }
00142 
00144     bool isManaged() { return managed; }
00145 
00146 };
00147 
00148 }
00149 #endif
